dao.name: CHK_GUEST_GRP_RF_ISEXIST_GUESTRF
dao.statement: select count(*) as guest_count from guest_rf where athena_id = ? and guest_grp = ?

dao.name: QRY_GUEST_RF
dao.statement: select athena_id, guest_typ, guest_sna, guest_nam, history_sta, guest_way, use_sta, rcard_prtrent, guest_grp, ins_dat, ins_usr, upd_dat, upd_usr from guest_rf where athena_id = ?

dao.name: QRY_GW_CUST_RF_DEFAULT_GUEST_TYP
dao.statement: select guest_typ as value, guest_nam as display from guest_rf where use_sta = 'Y' and athena_id = ?

dao.name: SEL_GUEST_TYP_FOR_SELECT
dao.statement: select guest_typ value, guest_nam display, use_sta from guest_rf where athena_id = :athena_id order by guest_typ

dao.name: SEL_GUEST_TYP
dao.statement: select guest_typ ,guest_sna ,guest_nam, (trim(guest_typ) ||':'|| guest_nam) as guest_display from guest_rf where athena_id = :athena_id order by guest_typ

dao.name: SEL_GUEST_RF
dao.statement: select guest_typ value, guest_sna display from guest_rf where athena_id = :athena_id and guest_typ = :guest_typ

dao.name: SEL_GUEST_RF_Y
dao.statement: select guest_typ, guest_sna display, guest_nam value, use_sta from guest_rf where athena_id = :athena_id order by guest_typ
